text: Wong mau (ahli kitab) anggone kelakon pasulayan perkara agama, sawise katekan kaweruh agama wulangane nabine banjur padha rebut unggul umpama durung ana dhawuhing Pangeranira. Patrapane dosa disratekake tekan qiyamat mesthi dituruni siksa sanalika, dene wong kang padha nyekel kitab kuna sapungkure nabine padha mamang (marang Muhammad)
